title: Staffords heauenly dogge: or The life, and death of that great cynicke Diogenes, whom Lertius stiles Canem CÅ“lestem, the heauenly dogge, by reason of the heauenly precepts he gaue Taken out of the best authors, and written to delight great hearts, and to raise as high as heauen the minds that now grouell on the earth, by teaching them how to ouercome all affections, and afflictions.
author: Stafford, Anthony.
